title: Mercedes Benz expands presence in India with ambitious launch plans for 2024
description: Mercedes Benz India - which grew volumes by 10% to a record 17,408 units last year - expects sales to increase in double-digits in 2024. To realise this targets, the company has firmed up plans to invest an additional Rs 200 crore to enhance capacity, drive in new products and introduce new technologies in the country this year.
